sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
This action creates a new user in Workplace by Facebook.

Inputs:

  • Full Name - The full name of the new user to be created.
  • Email - A valid email address of the new user. The value of this input has to be mapped with 'Email' field of User record in ServiceNow.
  • Department - The department to which the new user will belong. The value of this input has to be mapped with 'Department' field of User record in ServiceNow.
  • Language - The preferred language for the new user. If the user's language is not present in the list then it can provided separately in the 'Other Language' field.
  • Other Language - The preferred language for the new user in the following format 'll_CC', where 'll' is a two-letter language code, and 'CC' is a two-letter country code. Read here for a list of supported language codes, Read here for a list of supported country codes.
  • Timezone - The timezone for the new user e.g. Asia/Kolkata. The value of this input has to be mapped with 'Time zone' field of User record in ServiceNow.
  • Active - A field to determine whether the user will be active or not, accepts value as 'true' or 'false' and is mapped to the 'Active' field in user record in ServiceNow.

Outputs:

  • Status - Will be set to "Success" if the request succeeds or "Error" if a failure occurs.
  • Error Message - Will be populated when the status is "Error".
  • User ID - ID of the new user created.
  • User Name - Name of the new user created.

Error Messages:

  • An user with the same Email ID already exists.
  • Email address is not valid.
  • Full name is not valid.
  • Timezone is not valid.
  • Language is not valid.
  • Either the access token is invalid or the access token lacks enough permission to perform this action.

To use this action, the corresponding Workplace by Facebook connection and credential must be created and associated with the Workplace by Facebook Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Create User
